name: 3ds Max Object Plugin
summary: Learn about .DLO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DLO plugins are one of several plugin types used by 3ds Max. Some others include .DLU, DLT, and DLM. Users often refer to DLO files as Procedural or Parametric Object plugins.

description: A DLO file is an object plugin used by Autodesk 3ds Max, a professional 3D modeling, animation, and rendering application. It contains information about an object the user can create and manipulate interactively in the 3ds Max viewport, including geometrical primitives (boxes, beach balls, etc.), shapes, cameras, lights, and helpers. 3ds Max users install DLO plugins to add additional functionality to the standard 3ds Max.

instructions: You can open DLO files with Autodesk 3ds Max in Windows. You can install a DLO plugin by placing it in the designated plugins folder within the 3ds Max installation directory.
